sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This Fix script will check whether the user hierarchy access control is enabled and will make the modules visible in case of upgrade scenario.</description> <name>check user hierarchy access control prps</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var prop = new GlideRecord('sys_properties'); if(prop.get('name','sn_grc.enable_user_hierarchy_access_control')){ var module = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module"); if(module.get('f231967f77d80110e723b23dbd5a99ed')) { module.setValue("active",prop.value); module.update(); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-11-30 10:15:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b3c7c92843e311107ffc7b548ab8f2dd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>check user hierarchy access control prps</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b3c7c92843e311107ffc7b548ab8f2dd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-01 09:28:37</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: check user hierarchy access control prps
